utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know what? It seems like all of the sudden; so much has happened.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know. Ross is getting married.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Phoebe is, making people.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Everybody’s doing stuff!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And we just sit here. I mean if I die the only way people would even know I was here, would be by the ass print on this chair! Look, we have to do something. Okay? Something huge!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We could climb Mt. Everest!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No-no, not something stupid, something huge.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no-no-no-no, I saw an ad for this video, people climb that thing everyday! We could totally do that!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why not?! I mean it’s just, it’s just climbing! It’s just, it’s just steep!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We’re going to Everest! Okay, it would be nice to leave an ass print on Everest!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What-what’s up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We’re gonna climb Mt. Everest!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah baby!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really?! I looked into that. Yeah, but, I mean it costs like $60,000 and y’know you can die. And, you would die!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, well…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We could get that Everest video though.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, we could do that without y’know risking our lives at all!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And while we’re down at the video store, you know what else we could rent? Die Hard! Oh, y’know what? I just remembered, that Everest thing is only available through mail order.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, well…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So you guys’ll stay here and hang out with me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeeeeahhhh.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But I’ll tell you something. One of these days we’re get off of our buts and rent Die Hard again!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah we are!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: So what did he decide? Does your Uncle Nathan get an invite or not?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh, God, nobody likes him, and he’s so cheap, he’d never fly to London in a million years. Yeah, invite him? Hey, did I do these neat enough?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Yeah, they’re fine.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: If anyone asks, we’ll just say Ben addressed them. Oh! So you invited Rachel then?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sure. Why not?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: I don’t think I’d be comfortable with any of my old lovers there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait-wait-wait, do you, do you think, maybe we shouldn’t invite her?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Oh, no-no, y’know I absolutely adore Rachel it’s just that, well it might be a awkward for you. But it’s absolutely your decision. More tea?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah sure.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Earl Grey?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh? Yeah, fine, invite whoever you want.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't want to be single, okay? I just... I just- I just wanna be married again!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And I just want a million dollars!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God Monica hi! I just went to your building and you weren't there and then this guy with a big hammer said you might be here and you are, you are!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, everybody, this is Rachel, another Lincoln High survivor. This is everybody, this is Chandler, and Phoebe, and Joey, and- you remember my brother Ross?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi, sure!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You know you probably didn't know this, but back in high school, I had a, um, major crush on you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I knew.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You did! Oh.... I always figured you just thought I was Monica's geeky older brother.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I did.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh. Listen, do you think- and try not to let my intense vulnerability become any kind of a factor here- but do you think it would be okay if I asked you out? Sometime? Maybe?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, maybe...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay... okay, maybe I will...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: See, I see.... big passion in your future.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I do.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Ross, you're so great.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's never gonna happen.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, I have a question. Well, actually, it's not so much a question as.. more of a general wondering... ment.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: OK.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OK. Umm, for a while now, I've been wanting to, um....

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhh!!!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, yes, that's right...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, look at the little cat! Look at it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? Ow!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, listen, missy. If you want this cart, you're gonna have to take me with it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes! Did you see that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You were incredible! Brand new woman, ladies and gentlemen.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I could not have done this without you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ok, um, uh, more clothes in the dryer? I'm fine, I'm fine.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You had no right to tell me you ever had feelings for me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I was doing great with Julie before I found out about you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, I was doin' great before I found out about you. You think it's easy for me to see you with Julie?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The point is I... I don't need this right now, OK. It, it's too late, I'm with somebody else, I'm happy. This ship has sailed.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright, fine, you go ahead and you do that, alright Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Fine.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: 'Cause I don't need your stupid ship.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross do you realise this is the first time in my life I’m doing something I actually care about. This is the first time in my life I’m doing something that I’m actually good at. I mean. if you don’t get that...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, hey, I get that, okay, I get that big time. And I’m happy for ya, but I’m tired of having a relationship with your answering machine! Okay, I don’t know what to do anymore.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well neither do I!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is this about Mark?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, it’s not, it’s not.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God. I cannot keep having this same fight over and over again, Ross, no, you’re, you’re, you’re making this too hard.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh I’m, I’m making this too hard. Okay, what do you want me to do.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know, I don’t know. Urrrgh! Look, maybe we should take a break.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, okay, fine, you’re right. Let’s ah, let’s take a break, let’s cool off, okay, let’s get some frozen yogart, or something..

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. A break from us.

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Do I know why we’re rushing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, y'know the ah, the girlfriend I told you about last night? Well it turns out she ah, she wants to get back together with me. Oh, I found it!!

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: That’s so great for you guys!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Chloe
utterance.content: Good luck, with your girlfriend.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, thank you. Hey, hey. Rachel!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi. Ohhh, you got my message.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, oh hey, you are right on time.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So what do you say? Can I be your girlfriend again?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, you can, very much.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ahhhh!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y'know what, I want you to leave! Get outta here!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Just get out! Now!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!! No!! I wanna stay. I wanna talk about this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay! All right! How was she?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh-oh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Was she good?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don’t answer that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on Ross! You said you wanted to talk about it, let’s talk about it!! How was she?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She was...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Awful! Horrible!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She was not good. Not good.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She was nothing compared to you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She, she was different.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ewwwww!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh-oh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Good different?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nobody likes change.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? Okay, okay, okay, okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: ...the way you owned up to everything, it just showed me how much you’ve grown. Y'know? I mean my Mom never thought this would work out. It was all, “Once a cheater, always a cheater.” Ooh, I just wish we hadn’t lost those four months, but if time was what you needed just to gain a little perspective...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: WE WERE ON A BREAK!!!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You seem to really like her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I really do. Yeah, but what am I gonna do, I mean we-we both agreed that it was gonna be a two-week thing, y’know no commitment.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, that girl just spent the entire evening talking to your friends, asking to hear stories about you, looking through Monica’s photo albums, I mean you don’t do that if you’re just in it for two weeks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You think?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, you got like 14 hours until she has to be at the airport, and you’re sitting here in the hallway with a 28-year-old cheerleader with a fat lip.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, you’re right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh, this is soo amazing! I can’t believe my brother’s getting married! And in London! It’s so romantic!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, pretty smart! Tissue paper! You’re at the wedding, you have to cry, "Handkerchief?" "No-no, I got my invitation."

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oooh look! Isn’t this adorable, Ross let Ben address mine!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hello!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! Hey, did you get your invitation to Ross’s wedding?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Noo.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don’t worry man, I get to bring a guest. We’ll show him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m so jealous you’re all going! I can’t believe I never knew that you can’t fly in your third trimester!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I didn’t know that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I never knew that either.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I knew that! I sooo didn’t know that, but you should see your faces.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey guys! What’s up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Heyyy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We’re hanging out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What’s this? Is this Ross’s wedding invitation?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: See, maybe that’s the one we should’ve actually hidden.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, no! No you guys! Come on, you don’t have to do that! I’m happy for him! I am! I really—I’m-I’m happ—I’ll work on it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m sorry honey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rach, you’re gonna come though aren’t you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, honey, I don’t know. I…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This isn’t one of those uh, y’know "If she doesn’t come, we-we don’t, we don’t come?" Right? Because I already bought my ticket…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know what would be real weird? Is if you weren’t there. Just say you’ll think about it, okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I’ll think about it. Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Who's this from?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, that's Ross's.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh... ... Oh my God. He remembered.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Remembered what?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It was like months ago. We were walking by this antique store, and I saw this pin in the window, and I told him that it was just like one my grandmother had when I was a little girl. Oh! I can't believe he remembered!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, it's so pretty. This must have cost him a fortune.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can't believe he did this.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Come on, Ross? Remember back in college, when he fell in love with Carol and bought her that ridiculously expensive crystal duck?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What did you just say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: F-hah.... flennin....

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.... my God.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Julie
utterance.content: Well, Ross and I were in grad school together.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But we haven't seen each other since then. Well I land in China, guess who's in charge of the dig.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Julie! Julie, isn't that great? I mean, isn't that just kick- you-in-the-crotch, spit-on-your-neck fantastic?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, that is so sweet. No, no, ok, you hang up. Ok, ok, one, two, three. Well you didn't hang up either.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She didn't hang up either...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ok, no, no, you hang up. You, you, y--

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, hi, it's Rachel. I'm just calling to say that um, everything's fine and I'm really happy for you and your cat......I am over you. I am over you and that, my friend, is what they call closure.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach, I got a message from you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God. Oh my God Ross, no, hang up the phone, give me the phone Ross, give me the phone, give me the phone, give me the. . .

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're over me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhhhhhhh God.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wha... you're uh, you're, you're over me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, ohh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: When, when were you... under me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, basically, lately, I've uh, I've uh, sort of had feelings for you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OK, I need to lie down.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He broke up with Julie. Well, go hug her, for god's sakes.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really. It's always been you, Rach.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, god.

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Joey
utterance.content: Ohhh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I've no idea, could be. Listen, I'm sorry I had to work tonight.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh it's OK. You were worth the wait, and I don't just mean tonight.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ah, oh God. Oh, honey, oh that's OK.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What. Oh no, you just rolled over the juice box.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Gunther! Gunther. Gunther, please tell me you didn’t say anything to Rachel about me and the girl from the Xerox place.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: I’m sorry. Was I not supposed to?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know, hey! You’re the one who ended it, remember?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, because I was mad at you, not because I stopped loving you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You still love me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Noo.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What does this mean? What do you, I mean do you wanna, get back together?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Noo! Maybe! I, I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I just, I feel, I-I just...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y'know I can’t believe I even thought about getting back together again! We are so over!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: FINE BY ME!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And hey! Just so you know, it’s not that common! It doesn’t happen to every guy! And it is a big deal!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I KNEW IT!!!!

utterance.speaker: MRS. GELLER
utterance.content: Rachel's coming up the path. Doesn't she look pretty. Jack...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know what this is, this is us getting ready for the prom.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You know what, you guys, we don't have to watch this.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oh yeah we do. C'mon.

utterance.speaker: MRS. GELLER
utterance.content: Get a shot of Monica. Where's Monica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Shut up, the camera adds ten pounds.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ahh, so how many cameras are actually on you?

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: Oh, dad, turn it off.

utterance.speaker: MR. GELLER
utterance.content: It is off. Right Ross?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Lookin' good Mr. Cotter.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: I can't go to my own prom without a date, I can't, it's too late.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: If you're not going then I don't want to go either.

utterance.speaker: MRS. GELLER
utterance.content: I have a wonderful idea. You should take Rachel to the prom.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know what? I think we've seen enough, let's turn it off.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: No, no, no.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OK, fine, well I'm not gonna watch, alright.

utterance.speaker: MR. GELLER
utterance.content: C'mon kid, let's go.

utterance.speaker: MRS. GELLER
utterance.content: Ahh, are you hadsome.

utterance.speaker: MR. GELLER
utterance.content: Let's show 'em.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: OK dad.

utterance.speaker: MR. GELLER
utterance.content: Rachel, ready or not, here comes your knight in shining... no.

utterance.speaker: MRS. GELLER
utterance.content: Oh, dear. Jack, how do I turn this off?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can't believe you did that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, well.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: See, he's her lobster.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nooooo. You’re really not going?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. It’s just gonna be too hard. Y’know? I mean, it’s Ross. How can I watch him get married? Y’know it’s just, it’s for the best, y’know it is, it’s… Y’know, plus, somebody’s got to stay here with Phoebe! Y’know she’s gonna be pretty big by then, and she needs someone to help her tie her shoes; drive her to the hospital in case she goes into labour.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You don’t have a car. And your license expired.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know. Yeah, see, there’s so much to do and I have so little time to do it in.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, check it out. Check this out. It says here that there’s a place you can go to rent videos of all the museums! "It’s almost as good as being there."

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It’s better! You can’t go to a museum in your underwear!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, You could, but... probably just the one time.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I bet we could get videos of all the sites, get a VCR in our hotel room... we'd never even have to go outside!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If we do that, we gotta get Die Hard.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh-ho! I bet the British version is gooooood!
